Class SubtitleService

java.lang.Object
fi.tuni.swdesign.movienightplanner.models.SubtitleService
public class SubtitleService extends Object
Represents a subtitle service with various attributes such as service details, type, link, etc.
Author:
janii, Copilot

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    SubtitleService.Locale
    Represents a locale with a specific language.
    static class 
    SubtitleService.Service
    Represents a service with various attributes such as ID, name, homepage, theme color code, and image set.
    static class 
    SubtitleService.Subtitle
    Represents a subtitle with closed captions and locale information.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    String
    link
    The link to the subtitle service.
    SubtitleService.Service
    service
    The service providing the subtitles.
    List<SubtitleService.Subtitle>
    subtitles
    List of subtitles provided by the service.
    String
    type
    The type of subtitle service (e.g., closed captions, subtitles for the deaf and hard of hearing).
